title: fix(enter): match tier panel colour to active tier + cursor-pointer fixes
author: fisventurous

gist.headline: True colors shining through
gist.blurb: Your dashboard just got a splash of paint! Tier panels now dynamically match your rank's signature color, from Spore teal to Nectar purple.
gist.summary: Updated the dashboard tier panels to dynamically reflect the active tier's specific color scheme instead of a default amber.
gist.impact: Users will see a more polished, color-coordinated interface that visually reinforces their current community rank.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot acting as a UI designer or artist, applying the specific tier colors (teal, pink, purple, blue) to the interface panels. Represents the visual polish and personalization of the update.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot painting a dashboard panel with a magical brush, surrounded by floating paint buckets in teal, pink, and purple. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The bee wears a tiny artist beret. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'FRESH PAINT'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
